clause.name: Leadership
clause.question: What roles and responsibilities are part of your team?

comments.text: is described in the main page.
Observation, agregar todos los roles con sus responsabilidades, en su main space, debe hacer match con su sdp addendum

clause.name: Leadership
clause.question: When the team is unable to agree on a a decision, who has the authority to make the final decision? Show evidence

evidence.expected: Documentation of these roles and responsibilities in the team page, must be up to date

comments.text: depende de las task: pueden tomar decisiones y si esta documentado
